original_title: Comedy Central Roast of Bruce Willis
overview: Bruce Willis goes from "Die Hard" to dead on arrival as some of the biggest names in entertainment serve up punches of their own to Hollywood's go-to action star. And with Roast Master Joseph Gordon-Levitt at the helm, nobody is leaving the dais unscathed.
tagline: They're gonna make him cry like a baby.
title: Comedy Central Roast of Bruce Willis
